title: All Ball - 'Last Dance' Last Thoughts; Former Western Michigan HC Steve Hawkins on Coaching, John Wooden Relationship
itunes:title: All Ball - 'Last Dance' Last Thoughts; Former Western Michigan HC Steve Hawkins on Coaching, John Wooden Relationship
description:
In this episode, Doug gives his final thoughts on The Last Dance, including Scottie Pippen and Horace Grant's complaints about the doc. This week's guest is former Western Michigan Head Coach Steve Hawkins, who reflects on his time coaching the Broncos, what's next, and one of his first jobs driving legendary UCLA coach John Wooden around. Make sure you download, rate and subscribe here to get the latest All Ball Podcasts!

Learn more about your ad-choices at https://www.iheartpodcastnetwork.com

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
